column1: Konstantin Mirovich Kozeyev (Russian: ?????????? ??????? ??????) is a Russian cosmonaut.
Kozeyev was born in Korolyov, Moscow Oblast, Russian SFSR on December 1, 1967.
He is a graduate student from Moscow Aviation Technology Institute and was selected as a cosmonaut on February 9, 1996.
Kozeyev is divorced and has no children.flew as Flight Engineer on Soyuz TM-33 in 2001.
Kozeyev is divorced and has no children.
